select g.id, g.img, g.`name`, g.marketprice, g.sellprice, g.stock, g.clickcount, g.sellcount, g.commentCount, g.desc, gd.id gdid, gd.`name` gdname, gd.val gdval, t.id tid, t.`name` tname, t.count tcount from goods g LEFT JOIN goodsdesc gd ON g.id = gd.goodsId LEFT JOIN goodstag t ON g.id = t.goodsId where g.id = #{id}
mapper.update: update goods set clickcount = clickcount + 1 where id = #{id}

mapper.select: select g.id, g.`name`, g.img, g.marketprice, g.sellprice from goods g JOIN (select id from goods where brandId = #{pageQuery.brandId} AND categoryId = #{pageQuery.categoryId} AND sellprice >= #{pageQuery.startRange} AND sellprice <= #{pageQuery.endRange} and `name` LIKE '${pageQuery.name}%' ORDER BY clickcount DESC, sellcount DESC, commentCount DESC, createtime DESC LIMIT #{startIndex}, #{pageSize}) g2 ON g.id = g2.id
